Name: Berry Nice
Ingredients: 7.5 ml Giffard Framboise de Ronce (raspberry liqueur)
Instructions: MUDDLE blackberries in base of shaker. Add next three ingredients, SHAKE with ice and strain into ice-filled glass whilst also pouring ginger beer.
Review: Rich blackberry flavour with a touch of ginger spice.
History: Adapted from a drink created in 2001 in the UK's The Living Room chain of bars.
